com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.viewer
Class Viewer<CP>

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.util.Observable
      com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.viewer.Viewer<CP>
All Implemented Interfaces:
SelectionProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
StructuredViewer, TreeTableViewer, TreeViewer
public abstract class Viewer<CP>
extends Observable
implements SelectionProvider

A Viewer is a model-based adapter for a Widget. Supports custom sorting, filtering.

Field Summary
 boolean preventRender
          True to stop the wrapped component from being rendered before the content has been returned (defaults to false).

getComparer

public ElementComparer<java.lang.Object> getComparer()
Returns the comparer to use for comparing elements, or null if none has been set. If specified, the viewer uses this to compare and hash elements rather than the elements' own equals and hashCode methods.

Returns:
the comparer to use for comparing elements or null

setSelection

public void setSelection(Selection selection)
The viewer implementation of this ISelectionProvider method make the new selection for this viewer without making it visible.

This method is equivalent to setSelection(selection,false).

Specified by:
setSelection in interface SelectionProvider
Parameters:
selection - the new selection

setSelection

public abstract void setSelection(Selection selection,
                                  boolean reveal)
Sets a new selection for this viewer and optionally makes it visible.

Subclasses must implement this method.

Parameters:
selection - the new selection
reveal - true if the selection is to be made visible, and false otherwise

setSorter

public void setSorter(ViewerSorter sorter)
Sets this viewer's sorter and triggers refiltering and resorting of this viewer's element. Passing null turns sorting off.

Parameters:
sorter - a viewer sorter, or null if none

public abstract void update()
Refreshes labels with information from the viewer's label provider.
